metadata.title: Marius Bălaj
metadata.description: I’m a UI engineer turned founder with a background in startups. I co-founded QED in 2021, grew it, and eventually sold it to The Sandbox. Now, I’m focused on building in AI.

about.title:
<serif><ui><animation><letterDown>A</letterDown><letterUp>U</letterUp></animation>I</ui> engineer</serif> turned <serif>founder</serif>.
One exit behind me, <serif>now building in <ai>AI</ai></serif>.

description.0: I’m a UI engineer turned founder with a background in startups — from blockchain pioneers to larger tech companies. I co-founded <url1><serif>QED</serif></url1> in 2021, grew it, and eventually sold it to <url2><serif>Sandbox</serif></url2>.
description.1: Outside of work, I box. I’m the president of <url3><serif>Viitorul Boxing Club</serif></url3>, where I train and help others do the same. I also <url4><serif>read</serif></url4> a lot — it keeps me sharp.
description.2: Now, I’m focused on building in AI.

footer.quote: The <serif>starry heavens</serif> above me and <serif>the moral law</serif> within me.
